channel.title: Best RS2 Remake
channel.description:
Can someone please point me to the best released rs2 remake? I know there hasn't been any "close to done" remakes released obviously, I need the one that is the closest and most developed. I'm going to be starting a new project and I need the closest thing I can get. Thanks for the help and effort. [b]EDIT:[/b]
duurrrrr use search bar
I did. Found nothing useful

item.title: Best RS2 Remake
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:13, topic:481722”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=599958.msg4215623#msg4215623 date=1360246780]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=599958.msg4215543#msg4215543 date=1360225709]So.
You want to find the most developed one, so you don’t have to do more work.
Nice way to cheat around work.
[/quote]

My intention is to start off with a strong base. If you have a problem with it, find a different topic to leave your pointless feedback on you ignorant f*cktard. The reason why I’m asking for help to find the best one to start from is because I know there are a lot of people on these forums who’ve come across good ones before and I wanted some opinions on which ones they think may be the best to use. I’ve searched many other RSPS sites but I’m still not sure which base is the best to start with. If you have a problem with someone trying to get help in the help section then maybe you should steer away from it and find something you’re actually good at other than spamming topics and leaving worthless replies.

I have seen only Remakes at download section… Just take from each some and you have soon most developed Remake…

Thanks but I’m looking to start from something that’s ready to work from and stable.
[/quote]

No, I have an issue with people not following rules:

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

You could always find a blank pi, or a hyperion source and just start from there.[/quote]

I’m sorry but I’m not going to start from a blank pi. First of all Project Insanity is half assed, over-used and over-rated. Second of all I wanted to start from a somewhat developed and stable base and not a blank. If I would have posted another section I doubt I would have gotten any more feedback than I got here because people are just gonna say the same stupid crap.

I’ve found a unique base and decided I don’t want to do a remake because it is just too much time to start from nothing and there is really no good base to start from apparently.

Read full topic

item.title: Best RS2 Remake
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

Nice way to cheat around work.
[/quote]

My intention is to start off with a strong base. If you have a problem with it, find a different topic to leave your pointless feedback on you ignorant f*cktard. The reason why I’m asking for help to find the best one to start from is because I know there are a lot of people on these forums who’ve come across good ones before and I wanted some opinions on which ones they think may be the best to use. I’ve searched many other RSPS sites but I’m still not sure which base is the best to start with. If you have a problem with someone trying to get help in the help section then maybe you should steer away from it and find something you’re actually good at other than spamming topics and leaving worthless replies.

I have seen only Remakes at download section… Just take from each some and you have soon most developed Remake…

Thanks but I’m looking to start from something that’s ready to work from and stable.[/quote]

No, I have an issue with people not following rules:

1. All topics in this section must be [b]requests for help on a server[/b]. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, 'coder'/programmer, [b]server or client[/b], or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

You could always find a blank pi, or a hyperion source and just start from there.

Read full topic

[/quote]

I’m not sure but I’ve been searching for the past few days and haven’t really found anything useful just mostly remakes that were given up on way too early. Maybe I’ll have to start one from scratch ;)[/quote]
